<![endif]-->  <p class="MsoNoSpacing"><b style="">Title: </b><span style="">Planet of the Anthropomorphised Fruit</span><b style=""><o:p></o:p></b><br /><b style="">Pairing: </b>Eleven/??? <span style=""> </span>with a little Rory/Eleven<br /><b style="">Rating: </b>R<br /><b style="">Word Count: </b>260<br /><b style="">Summary: </b>pure crack, which can be read in kind of context <a href="http://community.livejournal.com/eleventy_kink/365.html?thread=502637#t502637">here</a><br /><b style="">Disclaimer: </b>I don’t own the show, I don’t even own the idea (not that that stopped me from writing it)<br /><b style="">Author’s Notes: </b>written for <lj comm="eleventy_kink"/> , yay for random mental images! Doctor Who crack FTW. Cross-posted to <lj comm="elevenfic"/>  and <lj comm="ponchoboys"/>  because I believe in sharing crack.</p>              <p class="MsoNoSpacing"><b style=""><o:p> </o:p></b></p>  <p class="MsoNormal"><b><u><o:p><span style="text-decoration: none;"> </span></o:p></u></b></p>  <p class="MsoNormal"><lj-cut text="Planet of the Anthropomorphised Fruit "><b><u>Planet of the Anthropomorphised Fruit</u> </b><br /> <br /> His mouth waters as he takes in the sight before him. Just so big. He doesn't know what to lick first!<br /> <br /> This compulsion to lick is nothing new, and it seems to be getting worse with every regeneration. True, he's been fighting it due to the fact it squicked out his companions, but no longer, not with such temptation before his eyes.<br /> <br /> He doesn't want to cheapen this with words, sweeping in for a kiss, his tongue peeking out to taste. His tastebuds are in ecstacy and his eyes close automatically, savouring the sensation. He can't help but nibble at the red flesh, biting harder and harder until crimson juice floods his mouth and dribbles onto his chin.<br /> <br /> Mmmm... strawberry.<br /> <br /> He moves on, desperate to taste more. So many options, he moves onto the giant pear next. So juicy! He has to moan as he tastes the clear liquid, leaving a bite impression in the pear's soft flesh.<br /> <br /> He's so hungry, he can't help himself, he keeps licking and sucking and nibbling until the Pear hisses softly in pain. So he then takes a bite out of the Goliath Orange, like balloons of juice they burst in his mouth.<br /> <br /> "Erm, Doctor?" Rory interrupts his special moment. "Could you maybe stop eating the citizens of this planet?" Rory asks politely. The Doctor's eyes snap open, his pupils blown, his lips swollen and glistening.<br /> <br /> "I guess that could be arranged." The Doctor replies, his voice husky. Rory's flavour is intoxicating, heading and the Doctor finds himself craving more.</lj-cut></p></meta></meta></meta></meta>

Since youtube blocked my Doctor Who set to the Grease soundtrack 9 minute Amy/Rory ->OT3 fanvid (you can watch it @ vimeo if you like), I decided to throw together a little something to cheer myself up. A little vid about Eleven's unrequited love for Rory.


and before I forget or lose it, I've uploaded the 10MB 2:24 minute vidlet onto sendspace here

Contains clips for the finale so I'm warning those who haven't seen it yet so I won't hear a cry of 'spoilers'.

Also, contains a swear word and the nature of the lyrics are kind of crass and sexual... hope that's okay ;-)

Woah! This fanvid comes in at a whopping 9 minutes! (I totally cheated, half of that is actual clips with no music, but still...)

My Doctor Who vid set to the soundtrack of Grease. It's Amy/Rory but has an OT3 feel to it too. Contains spoilers for the finale, so if you haven't seen that yet you might not want to watch this. Saying that...




You can watch it here @ vidilife

The sound is a little uneven, and there's a bit at the end that will make you jump it's so loud, sorry about that. But please, tell me what you think about it. If you're insane enough to want to download it, it is 75MB, wmv and can be found here

Title: Sex is Overrated
Pairing: Eleven/Rory
Rating: PG-13
Word Count: 550
Summary: Rory thinks sex is overrated, much to the Doctor's horror
AN: written for  so just a little drabble
Disclaimer: If I owned Doctor Who, it would contain a naked Arthur Darvill.

Sex is Overrated

"Rory..." The Doctor pleads, making Rory roll his eyes. He's constantly surprised by how a 900 year old Time Lord can sound like such a child, especially when he wants something so adult.

"You're worse than Amy!" Rory scoffs. "Don't you have any self-control?"

"You're sunbathing, in Speedos, lounging and reading and you're wearing sun glasses. What do you think?" The Doctor bites back. Rory just lowers his sunglasses and leers at the Doctor.

The Doctor is wearing swimming shorts, his pale skin ethereal, his hair is wet and slicked back, water clinging to his skin. Rory does find his eyes drawn to the Doctor's hip bone, wanting to lick the water droplets off it. It's only then does he see the Doctor's erection.

"Why don't you find Amy?" Rory suggests. "She's got a ridiculously high sex drive."

"Why don't you?" The Doctor questions.

"Sex is overrated." Rory replies, returning back to his book, thinking the conversation is over.

"I used to think that too." The Doctor replies, sitting down next to Rory, ignoring his erection which doesn't seem to be going down.

"What changed?" Rory makes the mistake of asking. "Amy kissed you, didn't she?"

"Well, yeah, but that was a kiss. Sex never even occurred to me." It occurs to the Doctor now though, his eyes fixed on Rory's lips.

"Why were you so obsessed with making sure Amy had sex with me?" Another question. Rory asks a lot of those. It's how he learns.

"Well, she was your fiancée." The Doctor responds, shifting, because his erection refuses to go down, but he likes this. He likes chatting with Rory. "It seemed fair at the time."

"Why do you want to have sex with me?" Rory frowns.

"Why do you have sex with Amy?" The Doctor answers a question with a question.

"Because I've been in love with her forever." Rory honestly replies. "Because it's what she wants. Because it's a bonding experience. I've never been into the physicality of it." Rory confesses. "It's the emotional stuff I like, the closeness, the intimacy. And I think it's a shame, but sex isn't really intimate any more."

"Oh!" The Doctor's mouth goes slack as he comprehends. "I just think you're attractive."

"Sex is overrated, Doctor." Rory tells him. "It's messy and ugly and fake. It floods your body with chemicals and clouds your ability to think clearly. It alters people's behaviour, it affects their motivations. I just don't understand the appeal."

"You're a Nurse and you think sex is messy?" The Doctor's voice rises. Rory sighs, wondering if the Doctor heard anything past that part of his speech. "You clean up vomit, empty bed pans, and you're scared of a little semen?"

"I'm not scared, Doctor." Rory rationally replies. "Are you okay?"

"I'm horny!" The Doctor declares. "And I'm kind of scared you won't have sex with me." The Doctor confesses. "And a little bit devastated."

"Don't be." Rory cups the Doctor's cheek and pulls him in for a deep and sensual kiss. "Sex is overrated. Making love is vastly underrated. I love you Doctor and if you want me to have sex with you then I will."

"Thank you." The Doctor whispers, his eyes fluttering closed in pleasure. Rory smiles, because reducing the Doctor to this state, that could never get overrated.

*FIN*

<![endif]-->  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><b style="">Fandom: </b>Doctor Who<br /><b style="">Title: </b>Companion Swap<br /><b style="">Characters: </b>Six, Eleven, Rory, Amy, Evelyn<br /><b style="">Rating: </b>G<br /><b style="">Word Count: </b>1775<br /><b style="">Summary: </b>No plot, I just wanted all these characters meeting.<br /><b style="">Disclaimer: </b>This is a disclaimer<br /><b style="">AN: </b>inspired but not prompted by <lj user="eleventy_kink"/> , also inspired by the <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=szuP0oBZX4g">Children In Need Special starring Ten and Five. </a></p>                <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"> </p><lj-cut text="Companion Swap"><p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><b style=""><u>Companion Swap<o:p></o:p></u></b></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><b style=""><u><o:p><span style="text-decoration: none;"> </span></o:p></u></b></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">Eleven is in the TARDIS control room, just taking the old girl for a meaningless meander whilst Rory and Amy are... preoccupied celebrating their wedding. That’s when it happens.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">He sees her before he sees himself.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Dr. Smythe!” He wraps his gangly arms around her so tightly she almost drops her cup of tea.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Who are you?” She asks, trying to compose herself.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Me!” Six declares, eyeing up his future self.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Urgh! That coat!” Eleven screams.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“And what about it, bowtie boy?” Six challenges. Eleven recognises a fight he cannot win.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Bowties are cool.” Eleven says, before adding none too convincingly. “As is that coat.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“What have you done to the TARDIS?” Six asks in horror. “It’s going to take me forever to find the kitchen. I reckon this is a four cuppa problem, what do you reckon Evelyn? Another cup of tea?”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“No thank you Doctor.” She declines. “Not just yet. Will somebody please explain to me what is going on?”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Oh, it’s very simple.” Eleven explains. “Time, Space, TARDIS, kind of gets a bit muddled. Just need to give her a nudge and she should separate so you can continue having your... my adventures and I can have mine. Just a simple case of... ah.” The buttons he had been frantically pressing... did nothing. “That should have worked.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“You’re doing it in the wrong order!” Six scolds, taking charge of the TARDIS controls, only to falter when he realises he doesn’t recognise it.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“New TARDIS.” Eleven offers and Six makes a noise of understanding.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Ah, well, I’m sure between the two of us we’ll have her up and running in no time.” Six says confidently. Evelyn says nothing, just smirks a little into her tea cup.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">***</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“I brought tea.” Rory places a cup down where Six has stripped off his coat and is fiddling with the TARDIS’ cables. “And for you Doctor Smythe, I brought you some Andarican Shmitka. The Doctor didn’t have it in stock whilst you were aboard. I thought you might like it.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“It’s delicious, thank you... er-“ She realises that although he knows her name, she does not know his.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“I’m-“</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Rory!” Eleven interrupts. “Why are you here?”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“I, erm, well I kind of wanted to ask you to, y’know, keep the jostling to a minimum, since Amy’s asleep... if that’s okay?” Rory asks shyly. “Oh, and I thought you might like a cup of hot chocolate orange with a splash of tomato juice, just the way you like it.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“How do you know what I like?” Eleven’s eyes narrow. Rory doesn’t back down.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Because you told me?” It comes out as a question.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“I never told you what I <i style="">used </i>to like.” Eleven points out. “And how did you know what Evelyn would like?”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“The TARDIS keeps a record of these things.” Rory states. “You were fish-custard man. I was curious. Can you please not wake Amy?”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“There’s more at stake than a lack of sleep here.” Six snaps at him. “We can’t remain like this forever. We are in serious danger of creating a tear in Time and Space.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Sorry Doctor.” Rory bites his tongue, for a second. “But with the friction you’re creating you’re wearing the fabric of the Universe thin, it might tear any way.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“What do you know about it?” Six is surprised. As is Eleven. Rory hangs his head.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“It’s alright Rory, the Doctor sometimes gets a little agitated whilst he’s working.” Evelyn says sympathetically. “Manners are the first things he forgets when confronted with a problem.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“But he should already know the solution.” Rory claims.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“What was that?” Eleven pauses, turning towards Rory.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Both of you. You’ve encountered a Time Crash before.” Rory tells them. “It was a Stable Time Loop. You knew what to do because when you were your previous regeneration you saw your future self enter the correct sequence. Thank goodness the TARDIS pays attention to your life, I understand you’re getting on a little but I still think you should remember. Unless the TARDIS has picked it up from an alternate universe. She really is a remarkable machine.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“I bet you’re one of the most interesting companion’s I’ve ever had.” Six says, and Rory can recognise it as high praise coming from him. “No offense Evelyn.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Nah, he’s just bringing me along because I’m married to Amy.” Rory says, self-depreciatingly. “You haven’t met her yet, but once you do you’ll fall in love with her, everybody does. Even you’re not immune, but then again, you have eyes. And other parts.” Eleven’s eyes dart back and forth, but he says nothing.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Come along then Rory.” Six orders. “You think you know how to fix it. Why don’t you show us?”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“I will.” Rory replies. “And this time, watch carefully. It can’t be too long since you saw yourself fix it. Are you sure you don’t remember? I understand regeneration must play havoc on the memory but you’re starting to worry me.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Don’t you go turning that Nursey-thing on me, Rory.” Eleven says. “On him. He doesn’t need you worrying about him. I’m fine.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Is that what I sound like?” Six asks Evelyn. Evelyn is a lady and doesn’t respond. “And no, I remember just fine, but the TARDIS had changes since then.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Sure, she’s changed her layout but she hasn’t changed her functions.” Rory frowns at the lack of comprehension from the Doctors. “You did know what buttons you were pressing, not just the order, didn’t you?” There is another shudder as the TARDIS is tearing herself apart, trying to break free and failing. “Sorry,” Rory apologises to the ship. “I’ll deal with YOU later.” He directs to the Doctors, before pressing several buttons, pulling levers and typing in instructions. Both of the Doctor watch in awe and shame.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“How did you do that?” Eleven and Six ask in unison.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“I read the manual.” Rory says simply. “Did that never occur to you?”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“No man ever reads the manual.” Evelyn chuckles, “They think they don’t need it.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Are you saying I’m not a man because I’m not stupid or arrogant?” Rory asks her.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“I shall ignore that remark Evelyn.” Six pointedly tells her. “And as for you Rory, when did you have time to read the TARDIS manual, or learn how to make the perfect cup of tea?”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“There’s a time dilation field in the library.” Rory states. “I’m sure there’s a sweet spot on your TARDIS too. It’s a tad uncomfortable for her. I asked her if she wanted me to fix it, but she was very understanding.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Would you like to meet my TARDIS?” Six offers.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Rory! You can’t!” Eleven exclaims.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Actually, Doctor...” Rory corrects. “Somebody has to write the records I read. And I’ve got a strange feeling it might just be me. Kind of like the John Watson to your Sherlock Holmes. If Amy can run away with you on the night before our wedding, surely you’ll let me go with you now. Just makes sure she doesn’t wake up alone, she hates that.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“But what about me?” Eleven asks.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“You’ve got Amy, you’re fine.” Rory replies.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“What about you and ... me? He’s not very nice to his companions you know.” Eleven says, earning him a glare from his past self.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“I wouldn’t say that Doctor.” Evelyn tells Eleven. “I admit his social skills may leave something to be desired, but he does care.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“I’m a Nurse,” Rory replied. “I’m used to being bossed around by egotistical Doctors. I have no problem with it.” Rory reminds him, not even considering that Eleven might have a problem with it.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Well, that’s sorted then.” Six smiles. “Evelyn, are you coming?”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Not for the time being, Doctor.” She tells him. “I’d quite like to get to know your future self. And meet this... Amy.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“You’ll love Amy, Professor Smythe.” Rory grins, kissing her cheek. “You have fun and make sure he takes care of you.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“I can take care of myself young man!” She scolds him. “You take care of the Doctor, if he lets you.” Rory nods, grinning slightly.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Right, well. Come along Rory!” Six orders, entering instructions into his TARDIS, Six and Rory fade away. Eleven looks rather lost.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“He’s coming back.” Evelyn assures him.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“He took Rory.” Eleven voices.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“He left me.” Evelyn reminds him. “I may be no Rory but I’m not invisible. I thought you’d be glad to see me.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“I am.” Eleven flashes a smile at her, before turning back to the place Rory vanished. “But Rory...”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Have some chocolate.” Evelyn offers. Eleven puts a piece in his mouth absent-mindedly. He’s still frowning, which Evelyn finds very depressing. There’s not a lot chocolate can’t cure.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">A young woman in a white nightie with red hair wanders into the control room.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Doctor, what’s happening?” She asks in a Scottish accent, rubbing her eyes sleepily.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“You must be Amy, I presume.” Evelyn offers her hand for Amy to shake.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Who are you?” Amy responds, wary. “Where is Rory?”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Ah yes well,” Eleven looks to Evelyn, hoping to get to explain but she’s knows better than that. “It appears I kind of took him. But that’s okay. I left me Evelyn. Amy, this is Professor Smythe. She’s nice.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“She’s not Rory.” Amy pouts. “Where is Rory?”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Well, I sort of ran into one of my previous regenerations, there are a few of those around. He noticed how smart Rory was, and how good he is at making tea, and that he listens to the TARDIS. He kind of invited Rory onto his TARDIS and Rory... I don’t think he thought we’d miss him, so he went.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“And he left her here?” Amy asks. “You don’t sound like you were very nice.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“I chose to stay behind, to get to know you better.” Evelyn points out. “I know the Doctor’s coming back.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“With Rory.” Amy seems a tad obsessed.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“He may seem rather abrupt but he does take good care of me.” Evelyn offers, hoping that will put their minds at ease.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“And he takes good care of me.” Eleven recalls. “I swear, I didn’t get into half as many scrapes until I had him to patch me up.”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“You are going to return him, though. Right?” Amy asks.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Rory’s not going to forget about us.” Eleven’s voice is tinged with hope.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“You left me.” Amy recalls, worried. “I spent my whole life trying not to need anybody. He can’t think you need him more than we do!”</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">“Oh dear.” Evelyn sighs, realising she’s caught between the most complicated threesome. “I think this calls for more chocolate.” Evelyn states, supping her Andarican Shmitka and watching as Amy and the Doctor wait anxiously for Rory’s safe return.</p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p> </o:p></p>  <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;">*FIN*</p></lj-cut><p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"> <o:p></o:p><span style=""><br /></span></p>      <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p></o:p><o:p></o:p><o:p><br /></o:p></p>      <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p></o:p><o:p></o:p><o:p><br /></o:p></p>      <p class="MsoNoSpacing" style="text-align: justify;"><o:p></o:p><o:p></o:p><o:p><br /></o:p></p>    </meta></meta></meta></meta>

line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“No!” Rory flat out refuses, which is very hard to do to a naked Amy Pond. “I am not going to an alien nudist colony.”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Fine,” Amy pouts. “I guess I’ll just have to go with the Doctor.”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“I am not leaving you two naked together!” Rory exclaims. “I’m still not sure I forgive you for running off with him on the night before our wedding.” He mopes slightly, so Amy kisses him.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“You don’t trust me?” She fakes a pout and asks with heavily lidded eyes. Rory growls a little, realising that she’s playing him but he can’t really bring himself to care when she’s kissing him like it’s the most important thing in the world.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Fine, you can go.” Rory relents. “But I’m not going with you.” <o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Why not? I’ve seen you naked before.” She argues.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“The Doctor hasn’t.” Rory counter argues. “Neither have all those other naked aliens we’ll meet. I don’t want them judging me.” He admits in a quiet voice, knowing Amy will mock him for it. “What if the Doctor looks better naked than I do?” He asks in even a quieter voice.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Well, I wouldn’t say better.” Amy recalls. ”He’s a little smoother than you. But I think you’re just as hot as him.” <o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“You’ve seen him naked before?” Rory questions, on the verge of starting to sulk, which is something he hates. <o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Nah, he keeps the bowtie on when he wanders ‘round the TARDIS nude.” She flippantly responds. “Rory, come on. It’ll be fun!” She needles, her hand slipping under his t-shirt and starting to pull it over his head. He pulls away, folding his arms across his chest. <o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Are you ready?” The Doctor calls out, walking in. “Rory, why aren’t you undressed?” Rory doesn’t answer for a few seconds; too busy gawking at the Doctor’s body. Trouble is he can’t recall what he looks like naked, so Rory can’t compare the two. Still, the Doctor looks stunning and he doesn’t want to feel any more inadequate.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“I don’t want to go.” Rory hates how childish he sounds. <o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Oh.” The Doctor looks disappointed. “Why not?”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Rory’s shy.” Amy tells him. “He doesn’t want to get naked.”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Well, that’s a pity.” The Doctor frowns. “It’s going to be very interesting Rory. Kind of like a crash course in alien anatomy. I thought you’d like it. It’s educational.” The Doctor has clearly thought about this more than Rory gave him credit for. He’s close to changing his mind but all of Amy’s patience was used up as a child waiting for the Doctor. <o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“You get his t-shirt, I’ll get his trousers.” Amy orders, but the Doctor holds up his hands, refusing to take part.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“I don’t want him to feel uncomfortable; we can’t force him to join us on the colony.” The Doctor begins to reply, by which time Rory’s t-shirt is slung across the room and his jeans are down by his ankles. “Although if I had a body like that I’d want to show it off all the time!” The Doctor whistles. “You are beautiful!” He crows. Not a crush, though!” The Doctor confesses to Amy, not to Rory.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Yes, well I can hardly condemn you for that.” Amy smiles. “It would be mighty hypocritical of me, wouldn’t it?” <o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Are you sure you’re from the 21st Century?” The Doctor asks, grinning slightly.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“I don’t think she is but I am.” Rory pouts. “Complete with 21st century taboos. It’s not normal to be naked, and as I’m saying that I realise how it may seem weird to aliens. But we don’t have fur to keep us warm.”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Not a problem,” the Doctor insists. <o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“But it must be.” Rory argues. “All those different species, different alien physiologies, they can’t all survive in the same climate, can they?”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“If you come I can show you.” The Doctor sing-songs. <o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Please tell me that wasn’t a really bad sexual innuendo and that you’re actually planning to show me the device which makes the planet tolerable?” Rory sighs, his tone oddly hopeful. The Doctor stutters, faltering until he falls to his feet, lifting the material of Rory’s boxers to reveal a birthmark on his thigh. “Er... Doctor?” Rory asks, uncomfortably.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“What is that?” The Doctor licks it, causing Rory to splutter and pull his leg away. “It looks like a crescent moon, or maybe half a love-heart. It looks familiar, like I’ve seen it some place before...”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“It’s just a birthmark Doctor.” Amy answers, finding the whole thing very entertaining. “I first saw it when I was seven.”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Alright, stop bragging.” The Doctor tells her, before rising to his feet. “It’s very lovely.” The Doctor then proceeds to tell Rory. Rory doesn’t know how to respond.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Enough alien weirdness Doctor, I want you to show me an alien weird planet.” Amy grins. “Are you coming Rory?” She smirks. Rory lets out a whimper before pulling down his boxers. Maybe it’s in his mind but he can see the Doctor swallowing hard and Amy licking her lips. Rory’s blush deepens as he wonders what he has gotten himself into.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">*****<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">It doesn’t take long for Rory to forget his nudity. The planet is vibrant, busy with a variety of cultures. It’s loud and Rory finds himself wanting to hear what they sound like in their untranslated forms. The Doctor must know a bunch of alien languages, probably some not even pronounceable with a human tongue, but still Rory wants to know.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Close your eyes, and concentrate.” The Doctor whispers into Rory’s ear even as he’s covering Rory’s eyes with his hands. Rory is a bit panicked when he can feel the Doctor’s... nakedness pressed against his own bare thigh, and the Doctor’s breath on his neck. Rory is about to say something when he begins to hear it. A multitude of language, ranging from beeps to clicks and whistles to words and everything in between. If he concentrates he can pick out singular languages. Focussing on tone, pitch and delivery he can almost get the gist, the translation from the TARDIS very faint but making it possible to follow.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“That is amazing.” Rory smiles, his voice thick with awe. He slowly opens his eyes and turns to face the Doctor, who is mere millimetres away. “Thank you.”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“You two can make out later.” Amy interrupts the moment. “We’ve got some exploring to do.”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">*****</span></p></lj-cut><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><a href="http://beautybecks.livejournal.com/67343.html">continue to part two</a><o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p><a href="http://beautybecks.livejournal.com/67256.html">continue to part three </a><br /></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p></meta></meta></meta></meta>

<![endif]-->  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><a href="http://beautybecks.livejournal.com/67709.html">part one</a><strong><u><br /><br /></u></strong></span></p><lj-cut text="Dressing Down (2/3)"><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><strong><u>Dressing Down (continued)</u></strong><br /><br />“Okay, now. It’s very busy, I suggest you stick with me. Don’t wander off. I keep telling people that and no one ever listens. Hopefully I’ll have more luck with... Rory?” The Doctor’s rambling comes to an abrupt end. “Amy, where is Rory?”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“He’ll be fine!” Amy huffs. “Come on! I want to talk to people, visit all the places I can. Rory likes to find one place and settle there. Let’s move on.”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“I’d prefer to know where he is.” The Doctor responds.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“I bet you would.” Amy smirks. “Y’know, I don’t mind.”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Don’t mind what?”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“That you’ve chosen him over me.”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Hmm? Oh, I haven’t.” The Doctor is distracted, looking for Rory and Amy knows she could slip away and the Doctor wouldn’t even notice, at least not for a little while. “I mean, yeah, I think he’s kinda handsome. A little naive but that is part of his charm. He is really sweet, caring. He cares a lot, for everybody. He’s very thoughtful. Funny too, bless him. He’s nice, but I don’t go for ‘nice’. ‘Nice’ is over-rated. I like adventure! I like to experience the universe: he’s content to read about it in books. Ahah! ... Books!” The Doctor wanders off, his long legs taking quick strides and Amy has to half-jog to keep up with him.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Doctor, Doctor, where are we going?” Amy asks, only to be ignored which makes her even more frustrated. She understands when she sees a tented stall, full of books, paper and ink. In the centre of the stall, sat on the sandy ground with his back against the fabric, a book over his lap... is Rory. The stall owner is a burly looking bear of a humanoid, with greying fur and paws with opposable thumbs. It’s gazing at Rory with a quizzical look on its furrowed brow. <o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Is he yours?” The voice is deep, but warm. Like honey. Amy rolls her eyes at the association inside her head, even as she realises the Doctor is nodding. “First time here?” The Doctor nods again, even though he’s been here before. Never in this body though. “Most people who come here are extroverts. Three seasons I’ve been running this place, a library amongst the nightclub and restaurants and he’s the first to come. He is unique.”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“He’s a bookworm.” Amy scoffs. “Come on Doctor, I want to dance!”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Rory?” The Doctor places a hand on Rory’s shoulder and Rory jumps, even whilst sitting down. “Are you going to be okay here?”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Doctor, I’m in a library. What the worse that could happen?” Rory replies. Amy scoffs.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“You didn’t just say that!” She laughs. “I love you but you’re an idiot.” She kisses his head. “Come on, let’s dance Doctor.”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Are you sure you don’t want to join us?” the Doctor asks Rory, and it almost sounds like the Doctor is asking him on a date but Rory is oblivious, too lost in his book to even worry about leaving Amy alone with the Doctor.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“I’m good here.” Rory assures him, barely looking up from his book. He doesn’t see how disappointed the Doctor looks. “Krindor will look after me.” Rory smiles up at the bear-man, fondly. “You have fun. Make sure Amy has fun.” <o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Come on, let’s go.” Amy drags him away. <o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Er... not too much fun.” Rory shouts out as an after-thought. <o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">***<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">The Doctor doubts he could have too much fun without Rory, he can’t stop worrying. Shame Amy doesn’t seem to have that problem, caught up in the new and exciting atmosphere, pheromones lingering in the air which seem to make her more excitable than usual. At first she was determined to take the Doctor’s mind off Rory, but when he wouldn’t let her she moved onto to other people. Nothing too bad: just a casual stroke or kisses that don’t mean anything, but she could easily be taken advantage of and it’s the Doctor’s job to protect her. Although a teeny tiny part of him may be grateful Rory isn’t here because then Amy would be all over him, and there is just the slightest chance the Doctor might get jealous. <o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">Well, this is a nice emotional pickle the Doctor has gotten himself into.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">Right now, he needs to make sure Amy doesn’t get into a sexual pickle.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">She’s caught between a rebel Nebari couple, grinding against them, teasing them, and they expect her to follow through, hands getting more and more possessive and if the Doctor doesn’t do something soon he’ll never get her back. <o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“I’m sorry, can I interrupt?” The Doctor says, squeezing in between them. “Terribly sorry about this. Hope you forgive me.” He bites Amy on the arm.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Ow! What was that for?” She hits him. The Nebari couple apologise to the Doctor and leave. “I liked them.” <o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Sorry.” The Doctor apologises, before taking it back. “Actually, I’m not. If I didn’t mark you they could have taken you, marked you as their own and never given you back. For the purposes of this trip, you belong to me. It’s safer that way. I’m not letting you run off, that would break Rory’s heart.”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Doctor, do you find me attractive?” Amy asks, out of nowhere.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“You’re a human. I’m sure you’re very attractive to humans. Rory finds you attractive.”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Do you find Rory attractive?”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“No!” The Doctor answers too quickly. “His nose is too big. His hair, his hair, shorter than mine, but it still looks rather ruffleable. His eyes, well I can’t quite tell if they’re blue or green but they are beautiful... and that mark on his thigh, it looks delicious!”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“That explains why you licked it.” Amy smirks.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Yes, but other things look.... tastier.” The Doctor frowns.<span style="">  </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Doctor, I think you might be gay.” She tells him.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“What? No!” The Doctor is horrified. “I’m too old for sex. I don’t want it, and even if I did have a sexuality it wouldn’t be so... confined.”<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Then touch my breasts.” Amy challenges, but the mere thought makes the Doctor yell in horror. “This is awesome.” She enthuses. “It’s like I’m Emma Thompson and you’re Stephen Fry. Oh, Emma is a movie star and Stephen is... well, I think he’s a bit of a know-it-all but Rory loves him. Emma and Stephen have known each other for years, he loves her dearly but he’s just very gay. He’s super smart but her body is his kryptonite and she’s not afraid to use it. I love her.” The Doctor doesn’t really understand her rant, but he’s suddenly very wary of her and feels like he could use some back up.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“Should we go find Rory?” The Doctor suggests.<o:p></o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";">“You SO have a crush on my boyfriend!” Amy declares, but follows him anyway.</span></p></lj-cut><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Arial","sans-serif";"><br /><br /><br /><a href="http://beautybecks.livejournal.com/67256.html">part three</a><o:p></o:p></span></p></meta></meta></meta></meta>
